title: Five must-watch games from XFL's 2020 schedule
text:
USA TODAY

The Vince McMahon-owned XFL announced the schedule for its relaunched season Tuesday. It kicks off Feb. 8, 2020, and includes what the league terms a “79-day sprint from kickoff to the championship game."

The title game will be April 26 at 3 p.m., televised by ESPN. Every game will be shown live on national television:

Here are the highlights of the 10-week regular-season:

XFL DRAFT HIGHLIGHTS:Five takeaways from Day 1 of XFL draft

DAY 2 LIVE BLOG:Here's how XFL rosters rounded out

►Week 1, Feb. 8, Seattle Dragons vs. DC Defenders, 2 p.m., ABC: This will be the first game in the new XFL. The Dragons are coached by former NFL quarterback Jim Zorn, who will return to Washington, where he coached the Redskins from 2008-09.

►Week 5, March 7, New York Guardians vs. Dallas Renegades, 5 p.m., Fox: The Guardians and Renegades both have former NFL quarterbacks projected to be their starter. The Guardians have Matt McGloin, who was 1-6 with 11 touchdown passes for Oakland Raiders, and the Renegades boast Landry Jones, who was 3-2 with eight TD tosses for the Pittsburgh Steelers.

►Week 6, March 15, Renegades at Defenders, 4 p.m., FS1: These two teams arguably have the most intriguing rosters and leadership. The Renegades have Bob Stoops coaching, and he has brought Hal Mumme, 67, and his “Air Raid” offense. Jones played for Stoops at Oklahoma. Pep Hamilton coaches the Defenders. Former Ohio State national championship quarterback Cardale Jones is the Defenders’ top quarterback. The team also boasts former Stan Diego State running back Donnel Pumphrey, who rushed for 6,405 yards in college.

►Week 7, March 21, Renegades vs. Tampa Bay Vipers, 2 p.m. ABC: Good coaching matchup between Stoops and Marc Trestman, the winner of three Grey Cups as coach in the Canadian Football League. Trestman also coached the Chicago Bears.

►Week 9, April 2, Renegades at Houston Roughnecks, 8 p.m., Fox: This will be the first Thursday night game. In the first eight weeks, the XFL plays only on Saturday and Sunday.
description: The Vince McMahon-owned XFL announced the schedule for its relaunched season Tuesday, and it all kicks off Feb 8, 2020. Here are the highlights.
